subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jets running back LaDainian Tomlinson sent a message that there was something left in his 31-year-old legs after nine mostly stellar seasons and 12,490 yards with the Chargers.
snippet: Jets running back LaDainian Tomlinson sent a message that there was something left in his 31-year-old legs after nine mostly stellar seasons and 12,490 yards with the Chargers.
